title: Erotic Thesaurus: The Bald-Headed Hermit and the Artichoke
description:
The Bald-Headed Hermit and the Artichoke by A.D. Peterkin seeks to compile the majority of English-language terms currently and historically used to describe the body and human sexuality. Many of these words are relational, poetic, creative, life-affirming. Others reflect archaic or demeaning attitudes to women, ethnicity, alternate orientations, and human sexuality in general.  

This thesaurus, the first of its kind, nonetheless includes all words without censure so as to be comprehensive and true to the language of sex.

Check my torrents for other books on language, and please, seed.
